@graph.v:fn: 信州大学 附属図書館 繊維学部図書館
dc:description: Faculty of Textile Science and Technology Library, Shinshu University
3-15-1, Tokida, Ueda, Nagano 386-8567
http://www.shinshu-u.ac.jp/institution/library/textiles/  (Website)
http://www.shinshu-u.ac.jp/institution/library/textiles/extramural/access.html (Map)
館外貸出:可(来館して貸出・返却することが可能な18歳以上の方(高校生不可))
持参書類:身分を証明できるもの
制限事項:研究室所蔵資料の利用はできません。
複写時間:8:45-17:00 (土曜日は不可)
日曜日, 国民の祝日,  年末年始(12月28日-1月4日), 夏季一斉休業、休業期間中の土曜日、館長が必要と認めた日
ILL-Staff: Tamai and Abe
ILL-Org: Faculty of Textile Science and Technology Library, Shinshu University
ILL-Adress: 3-15-1 Tokida, Ueda-shi, Nagano, Japan
ILL-Commun1: Fax: +81-268-21-5321 / e-mail: jfg0100@shinshu-u.ac.jp
ILL-Commun2:OPAC: http://www-lib.shinshu-u.ac.jp/opc/
ILL-Accept: Foreign(1):OCLC(NII-OCLC Link):SUFTS / Foreign(2):KERIS
ILL-Sched:closed: Saturdays, Sundays, National Holidays, Dec 28-Jan 4
ILL-Bill: Foreign(1):OCLC=OCLC-IFM only / Foreign(2):KERIS=NII Fee Management Service only
ILL-Copy-Charge: Photocopy:35 YEN (or 80 YEN for color copy) per sheet / Postage required / Delivery method:via airmail
ILL-Note: Only the items held at the Faculty of Textile Science and Technology Library are available.
ILL-Note: Will supply only photocopies.
ILL-Note: DIS:Photocopy: author's permission required / THESIS:Photocopy: author's permission required
ILL-OCLC-Symbol:SUFTS
